name: SlipHover
tagline: Apply direction aware hover animation to images
body:
SlipHover ========= Apply direction aware hover animation to images or any other elements Go [here](http://wayou.github.io/SlipHover/) for more details; and see live demos [here](http://wayou.github.io/SlipHover/demos/index.html). Quick Start --- 1.Just like using other jQuery plugins, first include the jQuery and the plugin js file to your page. ```html ``` 2.Simply select the container element you want to apply to. The target can be any element. Say we have the following HTML structure, by default, the 'title' attribute of the image element will be displayed when hover: ```html
...
``` then we simply apply effect to the container. ```javascript $("#container").sliphover(); ``` That's all!
